author: Fox News
title: US military firepower rushing to Ukraine as besieged nation faces Russian invasion
description: Ukrainian Foreign Minister Dmytro Kuleba said President Biden promised his country more weapons from the U.S. in its bid to fight off a Russian invasion.
content:
